title: Work seamlessly with World Bank World Development Indicators (WDI)
text: important difference existing packages wbwdi designed () narrow focus World Bank Development Indicators, (ii) consistent interface R packages (e.g., wbids), (iii) shared interface Python libraries (e.g. ‘py-wbwdi’). wbwdi also refrains using cached data approach frequently leads problems users outdated caches uses httr2 manage API requests. relation popular existing R packages : WDI: uses cached data default, allow downloading meta data WDI API (e.g., languages, sources, topics), neither use ‘httr’ httr2. worldbank: allows download single indicator function call narrow focus includes Poverty Inequality Platform Finances One API. wbstats: uses cached data default, use httr2.

what: Internal function to perform API requests to the World Bank API — perform_request
title: Internal function to perform API requests to the World Bank API — perform_request
text: function constructs sends request specified World Bank API resource, options specify language, number results per page, date range, data source. also supports paginated requests progress tracking.

title: Internal function to perform API requests to the World Bank API — perform_request
code: perform_request(   resource,   language = NULL,   per_page = 1000,   date = NULL,   source = NULL,   progress = FALSE,   base_url = "https://api.worldbank.org/v2/" )

title: Internal function to perform API requests to the World Bank API — perform_request
text: resource character string specifying resource endpoint World Bank API (e.g., "incomeLevels", "lendingTypes"). language character string specifying language code API response. Defaults NULL. per_page integer specifying number results per page API. Defaults 1000. Must value 1 32,500. date character string specifying date range data retrieved (e.g., "2000:2020"). NULL (default), date filtering applied. source character string specifying data source API request. NULL (default), specific source selected. progress logical value indicating whether display progress bar paginated requests. Defaults FALSE. base_url character string specifying base URL World Bank API (default "https://api.worldbank.org/v2").

title: Internal function to perform API requests to the World Bank API — perform_request
text: list containing parsed JSON response API. response contains multiple pages, results combined single list. API returns error, provides relevant error message documentation.

title: Internal function to perform API requests to the World Bank API — perform_request
text: internal helper function constructs request URL using base URL, language, resource, optional parameters (date source), performs API request. paginated results, iterates pages consolidates data single output. function handles API errors, providing detailed error messages available.

title: Download World Bank indicator data for specific geographies and time periods — wdi_get
text: function retrieves indicator data World Bank API specified set geographies indicators. user can specify one indicators, date range, options tailor request. data processed returned tidy format, including country, indicator, date, value fields.

title: Download World Bank indicator data for specific geographies and time periods — wdi_get
code: wdi_get(   geographies,   indicators,   start_date = NULL,   end_date = NULL,   frequency = "annual",   language = "en",   per_page = 1000,   progress = TRUE,   source = NULL,   format = "long" )

title: Download World Bank indicator data for specific geographies and time periods — wdi_get
text: geographies character vector ISO 2 ISO 3-country codes, "" retrieve data geographies. indicators character vector specifying one World Bank indicators download (e.g., c("NY.GDP.PCAP.KD", "SP.POP.TOTL")). start_date Optional integer. starting date data year. end_date Optional integer. ending date data year. frequency character string specifying frequency data ("annual", "quarter", "month"). Defaults "annual". language character string specifying language request, see wdi_get_languages. Defaults "en". per_page integer specifying number results per page API. Defaults 1000. progress logical value indicating whether show progress messages data download parsing. Defaults TRUE. source integer value specifying data source, see wdi_get_sources. format character value specifying whether data returned "long" "wide" format. Defaults "long".

title: Download World Bank indicator data for specific geographies and time periods — wdi_get
text: tibble following columns: geography_id ISO 3-country code country region data retrieved. indicator_id ID indicator (e.g., "NY.GDP.PCAP.KD"). year year indicator data integer. quarter Optional. quarter indicator data integer. month Optional. month indicator data integer. value value indicator given country date.

title: Download World Bank indicator data for specific geographies and time periods — wdi_get
text: function constructs request URL World Bank API, retrieves relevant data given geographies indicators, processes response tidy format. user can optionally specify date range, function handle requests multiple pages necessary. progress parameter TRUE, messages displayed request parsing process. function supports downloading multiple indicators sending individual API requests indicator combining results single tidy data frame.
